author: 🍒Petra Stern שלום לישראל 🐮
text: Every day that passes #Russia wages an illegal war upon a peaceful neighbour. Join the urgent call for a new #NurembergTribunal to investigate #Putin and his cronies for the international crime of #aggression. #StandWithUkraine Sign & RT: https://t.co/R7sZE9CGqc
